response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and deliver exceptional value. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your daily life. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $120. Considering this, I would like to extend you an exclusive offer of $150 to purchase this product. I trust that you will find its benefits to be well worth the investment. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 150}
